name: 陳殿禮
objective:
本課程提供學生與家具實務界交流的平台，邀請家具相關領域的專家進行專題演講，並提供相互研討交流的機會，藉此使同學瞭解家具產業界現況及未來學習的發展方向。
This course provides students a platform for interacting with current furniture industry, through giving speeches from furniture relative field of industry experts. And provide opportunities for mutual discussions and exchanges. Thereby enabling students to understand the development of the furniture industry's current status and future direction of learning.
